name: Create new rows in Google Sheets and new contacts in ActiveCampaign from new Google Contacts
description:
This template periodically checks for new contacts in Google Contacts and uses the retrieved information to:
a) Add new rows to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
b) Add new contacts to ActiveCampaign

The template is using [this sample](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Vzqfjb8q8Peh1QkcBNhYNri_T9rpS3Cz3BCSkhO6_Jo/edit?usp=sharing) Google Sheets spreadsheet as a destination for the new Google contacts. You should make a copy of it before configuring the template.

The template is scheduled to run every 15 minutes. You can change the schedule after you set up the template.
